title: You’re My Wonderwall - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Adapted to Manhua   Bands   Bickering Couple   Brotherhood   Carefree Protagonist   Cohabitation   Cold Love Interests   Complex Family Relationships   Confident Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Family Conflict   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Modern Day   Music   Poor Protagonist   Shameless Protagonist   Tsundere
author: Mu Gua Huang   木瓜黄
description:
Lu Yan, the beacon of Xaicheng locality, the influential lead vocalist of a renowned underground music band, and a music prodigy, appearing like a “X professor.”

The new next-door neighbor, Xiao Heng, only assumes that he was a damn pup who couldn’t play the guitar…. a dumb punk*.

*(Also known as 杀马特 or ‘damaged brains’. They like and blindly imitate the clothes, hair, etc. of Japanese visual rock bands.)>
